name: BlueJ Package File
summary: Learn about .BLUEJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Whenever you create a new project in the BlueJ program, the .BLUEJ package will be created and saved in your specific project folder.

description: Package file created by BlueJ, a Java development environment; holds the BlueJ package so when you click on it, the BlueJ program opens; also contains the date when the project it accompanies was created.
